content.question: In Olympia, Manet challenges the standards of academic art through his use of

choices.label: an idealized female nude reclining on a couch, rendered with subtly modeled contours
details that identify the nude figure as a real person existing in a contemporary setting
an animal to serve as a symbol of the universal ideal of fidelity
extreme value contrasts to place focus on the ethnicity of the figures

content.answer: details that identify the nude figure as a real person existing in a contemporary setting

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
